name: Shunn
appearance: Tall, soft-faced priest with salt-white hair and robes stitched with faint waterlines. Wears a conch at his waist that carries whispers at slack water.
character: Gentle and firm; a patient arbiter who believes fear is the city’s true adversary.
talents: senses lies by the rhythm of breath
turns rival speeches into shared vows
dreams: a formal accord between river and sea cults
expand the Infirmary’s charity without Ledger strings
keep the hush of the Surge from haunting children
secrets: bound a secret pact with terrace bell-ringers to force a day of stillness if violence looms
shelters emergency grain in temple crypts
dreams of a cracking lens that spiders blue fractures beneath Veylcrest
